game.description: A mysterious voice from the forest has been calling out to the villagers every midnight, causing fear and unrest. The voice is believed to belong to a legendary beast that was once vanquished but seems to have returned.
game.objective: Find the source of the voice and defeat the beast if it has indeed returned.

tasks.description: Follow the voice into the heart of the forest.
tasks.objective: Reach the heart of the forest.

tasks.description: Investigate the area for signs of the beast.
If the beast has indeed returned, confront it and defeat it.

game.title: The Beast of Mistwood
